response.overview: On January 20th, 1994, the Holy Spirit descended in power on a small church near the Toronto International Airport in Canada, From that event has sprung a worldwide revival that has touched the lives of millions of people all over the world. In fact, it was the British press that first named this great revival "The Toronto Blessing". This video is a true behind-the-scenes look at this revival, with footage that has never been filmed before.
response.tagline: For the first time, the real inside story on this outbreak of revival!
response.title: Go Inside the Toronto Blessing
